net.happybrackets.core.control

Class AccelerometerMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.core.control.AccelerometerMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomGlobalEncoder

    public class AccelerometerMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomGlobalEncoder
    Encodes x, y and z parameters as an Object array so it can be passed via a Dynamic Control message The conversion only takes place if the message is passed as a global message
